attributes.action: investigate the withdrawal symptoms of the antidepressant Venlafaxine.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The drug Venlafaxine is extremely difficult to withdraw from after the drug has been used to treat depression. Withdrawal symptoms can include

Electric Shock and "brain shiver" sensations. These sensations may represent significant alteration of neuronal activity in the central nervous system.

Other symptoms include confusion, impaired coordination, sensory disturbances, vertigo, delirium, strokelike symptoms, and depersonalization. Patients that miss medication for more than 24 hours can experience the "electric shock" "brain shiver / popping" and general confusion. The maker states that this medication is non addictive.

Typing "venlafaxine withdrawal" into any search engine will reveal support groups and medical abstract to support this claim.
